name: Polygons: A Multi-Sided Love Story
description:
Tired of dating boring 3D people? Tired of dating 2D people who look like 3D people? Well do I have the solution for you!

Introducing the newest dating sensation: Polygons! Curvy, edgy, flat, we've got it all!

Select one of our lovely shapes and see:
▪ Romance!
▪ Drama!
▪ Joy!
▪ Puns!
▪ The Supernatural???

And who knows! Maybe you'll attract the attention of a very special shape. One that might... steal your heart. *winkwinknudgenudge*

The best part is the game is absolutely free! You will be asked if you'd like to donate, but you can press no to go straight to downloading. However, if you do decide to donate, you'll get a small bundle of goodies as a thank you.

For those more interested in an RPG experience, feel free to check out my previous game, Crystal S.!

Enjoy. ♥
